resources.string: Replace all version using CD. Check that Adverts and Browser Window are displaying correctly.
Check Regional settings.Date and Time Format (dd/MM/yyyy and HH:mm:ss) Assign full access on the X/procureÂ® folder to everyone and users at every pharmacy visit.
Check pharmacy info in Prefs screen.Ensure ALL details are entered.(Phy name,tel,fax,email,postal + physical address)NO SPECIAL CHARACTERS ALLOWED

1.Enquire if the Pharmacy have any other accounts and load them if required. 2.When ADCOCK is loaded OPUS,NORGINE and HEELSA must also be loaded with same account as ADCOCK. 3.Check that if Kemco is loaded,Kemco B and account numbers are correctly entered.4. Check IHD account and Branch code. 5.If Alpha Pharm Durban account is loaded load NWC,DWC Base + Sub classes B and C. 6.UPD Clicks must be loaded at Clicks,please make sure the following classes are loaded for each respective region:PPPJHB,PPPBF,PPPCT,PPPDBN,PEUPDSP. 7.At Clicks please map a network drive as x: to the Samba server and point the Integration Import and Export paths to X: 8. When loading Pharma dynamics or UPD a serial number must be setup in back office and this can take up to 24h.
Training:Please train customers on the following:

1.Regret re-order,if many regrets consider setting (DelRegretsOlderThan=60) 2. Use X/procure training check list when full training is provided. 3. Show where to find the help desk number. 4. Check the integration and ask if they need the integration installed. 5. Also provide training where needed.

Send an order and make sure FTPSync and Data Sync works,include Order number in B and F,if the client does not want to order then phone help desk for an out of stock item of the day that you can order.
Action that needs to be taken with different Windows version:

a. Windows XP Home,it is not advisable,please advise customer. b. Service Pack 2 must be installed.c.Set Windows to Best Performance.d. Check Windows paging file and set to recommended size.e. In Win Vista or Higher check Regional settings Digital Grouping Symbol must have a comma.

Make sure this following has been updated in regional settings. a.Under numbers change the decimal symbol to a full stop.Change the digital grouping symbol to a comma and change the list separator to a comma.Under currency change the decimal symbol to a comma and change the digit grouping symbol to a comma.
When installing any form of Hardware to load.Complete a Load POD Form:
